thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 92 of 625
thread.title: A. Greenwood

author: A. Greenwood
title: A. Greenwood
text: Love the new options for plus sizes. Unfortunately, sometimes when you click on the links to the outfit or item, the non-plus size woman is in the outfit! I want to see what my size 14 body will look like, not someone who is a size 2! Besides that, I thinks it's awesome that cute, colorful, sexy workout clothes are available for me. No more baggy shirts over black yoga pants.
